member.name: IVisualTreeServiceCallback2.OnElementStateChanged
member.summary: Communicates the state of an element in the visual tree when it changes.
member.param: The XAML element in the visual tree.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IVisualTreeServiceCallback2
member.summary: Represents additional capabilities of an IVisualTreeServiceCallback object.
